edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Visual Question Answering 使用 VQA 数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: We provide a dataset containing ∼0.25M images, ∼0.76M questions, and ∼10M answers.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Latent Left Linking model (L3M) 使用 ACE 和 Ontonotes 数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: Experiments on ACE and Ontonotes data show that L3M and its constrained version, CL3M, are more accurate than several state-of-the-art approaches.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Latent Left Linking model (L3M) 使用 ACE 和 Ontonotes 数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: Experiments on ACE and Ontonotes data show that L3M and its constrained version, CL3M, are more accurate than several state-of-the-art approaches.

edges.label: Improve
edges.structure: 算法设计或结构上的创新
edges.detail: Chiang2018_SemanticallyAlignedEquation 在 Roy2018_SemanticallyAlignedEquation 的基础上改进了语义对齐机制，提高了数学问题求解的准确性。
edges.evidence: Chiang and Chen (2018) improved the semantically-aligned equation generation method, enhancing the accuracy of math word problem solving compared to Roy and Roth's 2018 work.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: RNN Encoder-Decoder algorithm uses unspecified datasets for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: The performance of a statistical machine translation system is empirically found to improve by using the conditional probabilities of phrase pairs computed by the RNN Encoder–Decoder as an additional feature in the existing log-linear model.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Retrieval, Statistics, and Inference System algorithm uses NY Regents Science Exam dataset for evaluation.
edges.evidence: We evaluate the methods on six years of unseen, unedited exam questions from the NY Regents Science Exam.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Rectangle Detection 使用 Hough Transform 进行线段检测。
edges.evidence: The proposed technique for rectangle detection using a windowed Hough Transform.

edges.label: Extend
edges.detail: NECO 扩展了 Joint Coreference Resolution and Named-Entity Linking 的功能。
edges.evidence: NECO extends the Stanford deterministic coreference system by automatically linking mentions to Wikipedia and introducing new NEL-informed mention-merging sieves.

edges.label: Use
edges.structure: Ranking SVM Model使用了Yahoo! Answers数据集
edges.detail: Ranking SVM Model在Yahoo! Answers数据集上进行了实验。
edges.evidence: Ranking SVM Model was tested on Yahoo! Answers (Huang, D., Shi, S., et al., 2016).

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Large-Scale Dataset Construction algorithm uses Yahoo! Answers dataset for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: Problems in the dataset are semi-automatically obtained from community question-answering (CQA) web pages.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Fine-Grained Expressions在Dolphin18K数据集上进行了实验。
edges.evidence: Fine-Grained Expressions was tested on the Dolphin18K dataset (Huang, D., Shi, S., et al., 2017).

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Fine-grained Expressions在Math23K数据集上进行了实验。
edges.evidence: Fine-grained Expressions was tested on the Math23K dataset (Huang, D., Shi, S., et al., 2017).

edges.label: Improve
edges.structure: 算法设计或结构上的创新
edges.detail: Huang2017_FineGrainedExpressions 在 Huang2016_FineGrainedExpressions 的基础上增加了表达式的细粒度处理，提升了数学问题求解的准确性。
edges.evidence: Huang et al. (2017) introduced fine-grained expressions to enhance the accuracy of solving math word problems, building upon their previous work in 2016.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Fine-grained Expressions algorithm uses Dolphin18K dataset for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: Given an image and a natural language question about the image, the task is to provide an accurate natural language answer. The dataset used is Dolphin18K.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Huang2017_FineGrainedExpressions 使用 Accuracy 作为评估指标。
edges.evidence: Huang et al. (2017) used accuracy as the evaluation metric for their fine-grained expressions method.

edges.label: Extend
edges.structure: 在现有算法中添加新模块、功能或组件
edges.detail: Huang2018_ReinforcementLearning 在 Wang2017_MathDQN 的基础上引入了复制和对齐机制，增强了模型的泛化能力。
edges.evidence: Huang et al. (2018) extended the MathDQN algorithm by adding a copy and alignment mechanism, improving the generalization ability of the model.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Data-Driven Methods algorithm uses large-scale datasets for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: We explore contemporary, data-driven techniques for solving math word problems over recent large-scale datasets.

edges.label: Use
edges.structure: ARIS使用了小学测试题数据集
edges.detail: ARIS在小学测试题数据集上进行了实验。
edges.evidence: ARIS was tested on primary school test questions (Hosseini, M. J., Hajishirzi, H., et al., 2015).

edges.label: Improve
edges.detail: ARIS algorithm improves Expression Tree algorithm by using verb categorization.
edges.evidence: ARIS learns to categorize verbs with 81.2% accuracy, and is able to solve 77.7% of the problems in a corpus of standard primary school test questions.

edges.target: CORPUS OF STANDARD PRIMARY SCHOOL TEST QUESTIONS
edges.label: Use
edges.detail: ARIS algorithm uses a corpus of standard primary school test questions for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: We report the first learning results on this task without reliance on pre-defined templates and make our data publicly available.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Expression Tree algorithm uses multiple datasets for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: The datasets used are AI2, IL, CC, SingleEQ, and AllArith.

edges.evidence: The datasets used are AI2, IL, CC, SingleEQ, and AllArith.

edges.evidence: The datasets used are AI2, IL, CC, SingleEQ, and AllArith.

edges.label: Extend
edges.detail: Unit Dependency Graph 扩展了 Expression Tree 的功能。
edges.evidence: We introduce a decomposed model for inducing UDGs with minimal additional annotations, and use it to augment the expressions used in the arithmetic word problem solver of(Roy and Roth 2015) via a constrained inference framework.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Expression Tree algorithm uses multiple datasets for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: The datasets used are AI2, IL, CC, SingleEQ, and AllArith.

edges.evidence: General Arithmetic Word Problem Solver was tested on benchmark datasets (Roy, S., & Roth, D., 2015).

edges.label: Improve
edges.structure: General Arithmetic Word Problem Solver改进了Expression Tree
edges.detail: General Arithmetic Word Problem Solver通过引入表达树和编码-解码框架，改进了Expression Tree的表达生成能力。
edges.evidence: General Arithmetic Word Problem Solver introduces expression trees and an encoder-decoder framework to improve the expression generation of Expression Tree (Roy, S., & Roth, D., 2015).

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Semantically-Aligned Equation Generation algorithm uses Math23K dataset for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: Experiments are conducted in a benchmark dataset Math23K.

edges.label: Extend
edges.detail: Quantity Entailment 扩展了 Equation Parsing 的功能。
edges.evidence: We introduce a decomposed model for inducing UDGs with minimal additional annotations, and use it to augment the expressions used in the arithmetic word problem solver of(Roy and Roth 2015) via a constrained inference framework.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Unit Dependency Graph 使用多个数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: We introduce a decomposed model for inducing UDGs with minimal additional annotations, and use it to augment the expressions used in the arithmetic word problem solver of(Roy and Roth 2015) via a constrained inference framework.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Unit Dependency Graph 使用多个数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: We introduce a decomposed model for inducing UDGs with minimal additional annotations, and use it to augment the expressions used in the arithmetic word problem solver of(Roy and Roth 2015) via a constrained inference framework.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Unit Dependency Graph 使用多个数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: We introduce a decomposed model for inducing UDGs with minimal additional annotations, and use it to augment the expressions used in the arithmetic word problem solver of(Roy and Roth 2015) via a constrained inference framework.

edges.label: Use
edges.structure: Declarative Knowledge Mapping使用了基准数据集
edges.detail: Declarative Knowledge Mapping在多个基准数据集上进行了实验。
edges.evidence: Declarative Knowledge Mapping was tested on benchmark datasets (Roy, S., & Roth, D., 2018).

edges.label: Improve
edges.detail: Declarative Knowledge Mapping通过引入声明性规则和语义解释机制，改进了ARIS的表达生成能力。
edges.evidence: Declarative Knowledge Mapping introduces declarative rules and semantic interpretation to improve the expression generation of ARIS (Roy, S., & Roth, D., 2018).

edges.label: Extend
edges.structure: 在现有算法中添加新模块、功能或组件
edges.detail: Roy2018_DeclarativeKnowledgeMapping 在 Roy2015_ExpressionTree 的基础上引入了声明性规则和受限推理框架，增强了模型的解释性和准确性。
edges.evidence: Roy and Roth (2018) extended the expression tree method by incorporating declarative rules and a constrained inference framework, enhancing the interpretability and accuracy of the model.

edges.label: Improve
edges.structure: 算法设计或结构上的创新
edges.detail: Roy2018_UnitDependencyGraph 在 Roy2017_UnitDep 的基础上进一步改进了单位依赖图的构建和应用，提高了算术问题求解的准确性。
edges.evidence: Roy and Roth (2018) improved the unit dependency graph construction and application, enhancing the accuracy of arithmetic word problem solving compared to their 2017 work.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Diagram Understanding 使用 Dolphin18K 数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: In our experiments, GEOS achieves a 49% score on official SAT questions, and a score of 61% on practice questions.

edges.label: Extend
edges.detail: Rectangle Detection 扩展了 Diagram Understanding 的功能。
edges.evidence: The proposed technique produced promising results for both synthetic and natural images.

edges.label: Use
edges.structure: Diagram Understanding使用了几何图数据集
edges.detail: Diagram Understanding在几何图数据集上进行了实验。
edges.evidence: Diagram Understanding was tested on Geometry Diagrams (Seo, M. J., Hajishirzi, H., et al., 2014).

edges.label: Improve
edges.detail: GEOS结合了文本理解和图理解，进一步提升了几何问题求解的准确性。
edges.evidence: GEOS combines text understanding and diagram interpretation to improve the accuracy of geometry problem solving (Seo, M. J., Hajishirzi, H., et al., 2015).

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: GEOS algorithm uses official SAT questions and practice questions for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: In our experiments, GEOS achieves a 49% score on official SAT questions, and a score of 61% on practice questions.

edges.label: Use
edges.structure: GEOS使用了官方SAT题目和练习SAT题目
edges.detail: GEOS在官方SAT题目和练习SAT题目上进行了实验。
edges.evidence: GEOS was tested on official SAT questions and practice SAT questions (Seo, M. J., Hajishirzi, H., et al., 2015).

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: GEOS algorithm uses official SAT questions and practice questions for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: In our experiments, GEOS achieves a 49% score on official SAT questions, and a score of 61% on practice questions.

edges.label: Extend
edges.detail: GEOS algorithm extends GeoTutor algorithm by combining text and diagram interpretation.
edges.evidence: GEOS combines text understanding and diagram interpretation to solve geometry problems.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Automatically Solving Number Word Problems 使用 EMNLP 数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: We conduct experiments on a test set of over 1,500 number word problems and yield 95.4% precision and 60.2% recall.

edges.target: TEST SET OF OVER 1,500 NUMBER WORD PROBLEMS
edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Semantic Parsing and Reasoning algorithm uses a test set of over 1,500 number word problems for evaluation.
edges.evidence: Experiments conducted on a test set of over 1,500 number word problems.

edges.label: Optimize
edges.detail: Beam-Search Optimization 优化了 Sequence to Sequence Learning 的性能。
edges.evidence: This structured approach avoids classical biases associated with local training and unifies the training loss with the test-time usage, while preserving the proven model architecture of seq2seq and its efficient training approach.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Implicit Supervision algorithm uses DRAW1K dataset for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: The dataset used is DRAW1K.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Deep Neural Solver algorithm uses a large dataset for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: Experiments conducted on a large dataset.

edges.label: Improve
edges.detail: Deep Neural Solver algorithm improves Semantic Parsing and Reasoning algorithm by using a recurrent neural network model.
edges.evidence: Deep Neural Solver directly translates math word problems to equation templates using a recurrent neural network (RNN) model.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: MathDQN在多个基准数据集上进行了实验。
edges.evidence: MathDQN was tested on benchmark datasets (Wang, L., Zhang, D., et al., 2017).

edges.label: Improve
edges.detail: MathDQN通过引入深度强化学习机制，改进了MathDQN的求解能力。
edges.evidence: MathDQN introduces deep reinforcement learning to improve the solving capability of MathDQN (Wang, L., Zhang, D., et al., 2017).

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: MathDQN 使用多个数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: Extensive experimental results validate our superiority over state-of-the-art methods. Our MathDQN yields remarkable improvement on most of datasets and boosts the average precision among all the benchmark datasets by 15%.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: MathDQN algorithm uses multiple datasets for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: The datasets used are AI2, IL, CC, SingleEQ, AllArith, Dolphin-S, and Math23K.

edges.detail: MathDQN algorithm uses multiple datasets for training and evaluation.

edges.label: Optimize
edges.structure: 通过参数调整、训练策略或配置细节来提高效率、精度或收敛速度
edges.detail: Wang2018_MathDQN 通过引入更复杂的奖励函数和状态表示，优化了 Wang2017_MathDQN 的性能。
edges.evidence: Wang et al. (2018) optimized the MathDQN algorithm by introducing more sophisticated reward functions and state representations, improving the performance over the 2017 version.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Wang2018_MathDQN 使用 Accuracy 作为评估指标。
edges.evidence: Wang et al. (2018) used accuracy as the evaluation metric for their MathDQN algorithm.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: MathDQN algorithm uses multiple datasets for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: The datasets used are AI2, IL, CC, SingleEQ, AllArith, Dolphin-S, and Math23K.

edges.label: Improve
edges.detail: MathDQN algorithm improves Fine-grained Expressions algorithm by using deep reinforcement learning.
edges.evidence: MathDQN uses deep reinforcement learning to solve arithmetic word problems, which is an improvement over the policy gradient method used in Fine-grained Expressions.

edges.label: Improve
edges.structure: 算法设计或结构上的创新
edges.detail: Wang2018_TemplateBasedSolver 在 Wang2017_DeepNeuralSolver 的基础上改进了模板预测机制，提高了数学问题求解的准确性。
edges.evidence: Wang et al. (2018) improved the template prediction mechanism, enhancing the accuracy of math word problem solving compared to their 2017 deep neural solver.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Wang2018_TemplateBasedSolver 使用 Math23K 数据集进行训练和评估。
edges.evidence: Wang et al. (2018) used the Math23K dataset for training and evaluation of their template-based solver.

edges.label: Extend
edges.structure: 在现有算法中添加新模块、功能或组件
edges.detail: Wang2019_T-RNN 在 Wang2018_TemplateBasedSolver 的基础上引入了双向 LSTM 和自注意力机制，增强了模型的表达能力。
edges.evidence: Wang et al. (2019) extended the template-based solver by incorporating Bi-LSTM and self-attention mechanisms, enhancing the model's expressive power.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Template-Based Solver algorithm uses Math23K dataset for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: The dataset used is Math23K.

edges.label: Improve
edges.detail: Template-Based Solver algorithm improves MathDQN algorithm by using recursive neural networks.
edges.evidence: Template-Based Solver uses recursive neural networks to construct math expressions, which is an improvement over the deep Q-network used in MathDQN.

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Deep Neural Solver (DNS) 使用 Math23K 数据集进行训练和测试。
edges.evidence: Experiments conducted on a large dataset show that the RNN model and the hybrid model significantly outperform state-of-the-art statistical learning methods for math word problem solving.

edges.label: Improve
edges.detail: Deep Neural Solver引入了GRU和Seq2Seq机制，进一步提升了数学问题求解的准确性。
edges.evidence: Deep Neural Solver uses GRU and Seq2Seq mechanisms, which further improve the accuracy of math problem solving (Wang, Y., Liu, X., & Shi, S., 2019).

edges.label: Use
edges.detail: Quadratic Programming algorithm uses training data for training and evaluation.
edges.evidence: To obtain a robust decision surface, we train a log-linear model to make the margin between the correct assignments and the false ones as large as possible.

edges.label: Optimize
edges.detail: Quadratic Programming algorithm optimizes Data-Driven Methods algorithm by using a log-linear model.
edges.evidence: Quadratic Programming uses a log-linear model to maximize the margin between correct and false assignments.
